fields.data:
HyperLink properties:
⦿help - explain input pattern and purpose. can be displayed on ❔ button click
⦿dispaly - the label text
⦿text - if exist will show link text, else will show the url itself
⦿toolTip - tooltip will render onHover/onEnter
fields.name: info_msg_hyperlink_options

fields.help: Hyperlink will always open on new tab
fields.name: newTab_link
hyperlink_json
fields.default:
{
  "display": "NewTab Link",
  "text": "Nokia newTab text",
  "help": "Hyperlink will always open on new tab",
  "name": "newTab_link",
  "url": "https://nokia.com",
  "type": "hyperlink"
},
{
  "display": "Tooltip Link",
  "text": "Nokia tooltip text",
  "help": "You can show tooltip onHover/onEnter",
  "name": "tooltip_link",
  "toolTip": true,
  "url": "https://nokia.com",
  "type": "hyperlink"
}
